li.a: How to Enroll and Required Documents

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Friday, April 3, 2020 Dear Lemoore Union Elementary School District Families,
As we come to the end of our third week of school closure, I realize the information related to the COVID-19...
Please take notice that the Governing Boards of the Lemoore Union Elementary and High School Districts (Boards) will conduct public hearings to consider the adoption of a Development Fee...
Beginning April 20th, until further notice, meal distribution will be on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays only, from 10:30-12 PM.Mea ... View Image
Today is #NationalLibrarianDay, so we'd just like to say THANK YOU to all the wonderful librarians across the country! We might not ... View Image
The LUESD family wishes you and your family a Safe and Happy Easter Sunday! Distance learning and our meal service will begin Tuesd ... View Image
April 3, 2020 School Closure Update/ 3 de abril del 2020 Información sobre la clausura de las escuelas View Image
